description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 2.
comments: n, 9*n+2, 81*n+20 and 729*n+182 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..450000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+2) and IsPrime(81*n+20) and IsPrime(729*n+182)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
